Posted By: Batstewart (11/11/2009 2:35:49 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
2 Stars: Artist's name.  
1 Star: Zebra  
1 Star: The cost and superiority over Jump  
1 Star: Play with Zebra Unicorn. (Only Card with word Zebra in it)  
=5 star card.  
  
I joked with my friend that I must gather a deck with 14 Plains, 14 Islands, 14 Forests, 2 nonbasic lands, 4 Flights, 4 Zebra Unicorn, 4 Krazy Kows and 4 Hungry Hungry Heifers. Then challenge Jerry Tiritilli. He'll get Flying Zebra's and Flying Cows against him! Mwahahaha!
